issue.title: [R] Update dataset.Rmd vignette
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13399](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13399). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Proposed updates:
 \* Split supported formats into bullet points
 \* More subheadings (e.g. "retrieving data from S3")
 \* Change from "we" to "you" to empower the reader
 \* Remove backticks around "arrow" and "dplyr"
 \* Bullet points in "more dataset options" section to make more skimmable
 \* More subheadings into "writing datasets" section

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13399?focusedCommentId=17393422) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10765
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10765>
